text: William Rodman "Bill" Henry (October 15, 1927 - April 11, 2014) was an American professional baseball left-handed pitcher. He played in Major League Baseball (MLB) between 1952 and 1969. All the teams he played for were: the Boston Red Sox, the Chicago Cubs, the Cincinnati Reds, the San Francisco Giants, the Pittsburgh Pirates, and the Houston Astros. He was born in Alice, Texas. Henry died from a heart attack on April 11, 2014 in Round Rock, Texas. He was 86. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1927 births Category:2014 deaths Category:American baseball players Category:Boston Red Sox players Category:Chicago Cubs players Category:Cincinnati Reds players Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Houston Astros players Category:National League All-Stars Category:Pittsburgh Pirates players Category:San Francisco Giants players Category:People from Alice, Texas
title: Bill Henry
